doctitle.textblock: Passenger Vessel Safety Act of 1993; Correction

summary.textblock: This document corrects the notice of eligibility published on Thursday, January 6, 1994 (59 FR 792) concerning the Passenger Vessel Safety Act of 1993.

further.textblock: LT Brian Poskaitis, Merchant Vessel Inspection and Documentation Division, (202) 267-1464.

supplem.textblock: As published, the notice of eligibility (CGD 93-092) contains an error which requires correction. In describing to which vessels certain requirements of the Passenger Vessel Safety Act apply, the word ``and'' was used rather than the correct word ``or''.
Accordingly, the publication on January 6, 1994, of the notice of eligibility (CGD 91-035), which is the subject of FR document 94-262, is corrected as follows:

1. On page 793, under the subtitle ``Possible Modified Regulations for Certain Existing Passenger Vessels'' in the first paragraph of the second column, ``(a) At least 100 gross tons but less than 300 gross tons, and;'' is corrected to read ``(a) At least 100 gross tons but less than 300 gross tons; or''.

signjob.textblock: Rear Admiral, U.S. Coast Guard, Chief, Office of Marine Safety, Security and Environmental Protection.
